fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Flame Shot: Deal a Basic Attack to your target. If you kill them, their role will appear as [BURNED]. **Locked**: If they survive, you will disable their ITA/ICA for the next day.
-Take Flight (2-shot): At the end of the night, you will see all players who visit you, and you may choose up to two to roleblock. **Locked**: In addition, any ITAs/ICAs against you tomorrow will miss.
-Take Aim (**Locked**, 1-shot): You are guaranteed to hit your first ITA/ICA shot tomorrow.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Players nightkilled by you will appear as **Shot by 9mm Kiwi**
-**Locked**: While you are alive, all Beasts have their ITA/ICA hit chances increased by 5%.
-**Unlock Condition**: If the game has ITAs/ICAs, Unlock.
